# VMX_REASON_RDPMC

**Global Variable**

The guest attempted to execute read performance monitoring counters (RDPMC) instruction and the “RDPMC exiting” VM-execution control was 1.

## Declaration

```swift
var VMX_REASON_RDPMC: Int { get }
```

## Exit reasons

- **VMX_REASON_EXC_NMI**: VMX exit due to an exception or non-maskable interrupt (NMI).
- **VMX_REASON_IRQ**: An external interrupt arrived and the “external-interrupt exiting” VM-execution control was 1.
- **VMX_REASON_TRIPLE_FAULT**: VMX exit due to a triple fault.
- **VMX_REASON_INIT**: VMX exit due to an INIT signal.
- **VMX_REASON_SIPI**: VMS exit due to startup (IPI).
- **VMX_REASON_IO_SMI**: VMX exited due to an I/O SMM Interrupt.
- **VMX_REASON_OTHER_SMI**: An SMI arrived and caused an SMM VM exit.
- **VMX_REASON_IRQ_WND**: VMX exited due to an Interrupt Window.
- **VMX_REASON_VIRTUAL_NMI_WND**: At the beginning of an instruction, there was no virtual-NMI blocking.
- **VMX_REASON_TASK**: The guest attempted a task switch.
- **VMX_REASON_CPUID**: The guest software attempted to execute the CPUID instruction.
- **VMX_REASON_GETSEC**: The guest attempted to execute GETSEC instruction.
- **VMX_REASON_HLT**: The guest attempted to execute HLT and the “HLT exiting” VM-execution control was 1.
- **VMX_REASON_INVD**: The guest attempted to execute Invalidate Caches (INVD) instruction.
- **VMX_REASON_INVLPG**: The guest attempted to execute the Invalidate TLB Entry (INVLPG) instruction and the “INVLPG exiting” VM-execution control was 1.
